<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Expert Druid Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=5079) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 218 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Druid](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=213)

**Prerequisites**
[Basic Druid Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=5074); Master in [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)

</column>

---

You gain the expert [spellcasting benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=2132).

<title level="2">Expert Druid Spellcasting leads to...</title>
[Master Druid Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=5080)
name: Expert Druid Spellcasting
prerequisite: Basic Druid Spellcasting; Master in Nature
